Name: Darkened Glory
About the game: A BATTLE, A TRIAL Certain people have been chosen to redeem themselves, the accursed combatants that have misused the forbidden power. As a punishment, they are destined to fight for something called 'Darkened Glory', a trial that can help them lift the curse if they're worthy enough. Darkened Glory will test your skills in a high-paced, real-time adventure game. Play by yourself or join up with more players. Choose your combatant, whether a mage or a simple warrior, you will start with a small purse of gold that is enough to begin your quest for Darkened Glory. Be aware that this is an early access and we have 5 classes (with 2 sexes each) provided and 1 class upcoming. Currently available classes: -Warrior -Berserker -Mage -Rogue -Necromancer SPECIAL FEATURE INCLUDED - LEVEL EDITOR We want to express our gratitude to MatyGex for general support!
